page.title: 20Leisure and Recreation
page.content: I sometimes watch television when I get home to see what kind of programmes there is on.There is a Sports Park in Saxmundham but I don't use it very often. I belong to the Brownies we meet every Friday at the Middle School at half past five until quarter to seven. Mrs Potter is in charge. My Dad belongs to a dart team but my Mum does not belong to any.In Leiston there is a Sports Centre but I do not use it. On a Saturday somtimes Daddy takes us to Gt. Yarmouth to the heated swimming pool we don't go there too often though. Every Summer we go on holiday, this year we are going to North Wales we are going in a bungalow we are going for a week.
